entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

Temperature: 4.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
